channel.title: Legal way of selling runescape account
channel.description:
RUNESCAPE IS A TRADE MARK OF JAGEX LTD. I AM NOT PROFITING FROM INTELLECTUAL PROPERTIES BELONGING TO JAGEX LTD. IT IS PURELY COINCIDENCE THAT BY TRANSFERRING THE ANSWER TO THE JOKE TO THE WINNING BIDDER THE ACCOUNT DETAILS WILL BE MADE KNOWN TO ANOTHER PERSON. THE GAME RUNESCAPE AND EVERYTHING CONTAINED WITHIN IT DOES AND ALWAYS WILL REMAIN PROPERTY OF THE INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS OWNER JAGEX LTD. ANY BIDS ON THIS ITEM WILL BE BIDS ON A JOKE AND ANYTHING TO DO WITH THE COMPANY JAGEX LTD, ARE PURELY COINCIDENTAL. BY VIEWING THIS PAGE, INQUIRING ON THE ITEM OR BIDDING ON THE ITEM YOU AGREE THAT YOU ARE IN NO WAY AFFILIATED OR EMPLOYED BY JAGEX LTD. VeRo PARTICIPANTS HAVE NO RIGHT TO REPORT THIS LISTING TO ESSENTIALLY GET IT REMOVED FROM EBAY OR REMOVE THE LISTING FROM EBAY DIRECTORIES
say this on ebay apprently the account so happens to come with a joke. what do you think?

item.title: Legal way of selling runescape account
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

If you think selling a joke that comes with a free account is any different to selling an account, you’re sadly mistaken.

Even if it didn’t explicitly state in the TOS you weren’t allowed to give it away with something else…

Read full topic
item.source: Legal way of selling runescape account

item.title: Legal way of selling runescape account

yeh the jokes are prett expensive you know what i mean

item.title: Legal way of selling runescape account
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Yeh i like to do it by ‘Time it took to deliver’.Works very well.

Read full topic
item.source: Legal way of selling runescape account

item.title: Legal way of selling runescape account
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

you arent allowed to sell the account, as that isnt exactly possible. You can however sell an item (eg a joke) and it comes with a free account, sell the login details, or charge for the effort used to gain the stats/items.

Read full topic
item.source: Legal way of selling runescape account

item.title: Legal way of selling runescape account
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

It’s not illeagal to sell the login details of the account.

Read full topic
item.source: Legal way of selling runescape account
